name: Valet Frenzy
description:
Victor Valet needs your help! He's no longer able to manage his valet service by himself and needs someone to help him out. Are you up to the task? You're hired!!

Assign incoming cars a spot on the parking lot by drawing a path from the car to the parking spot. However, keep an eye out for cars that need to be returned. Return cars to the correct exit so that precious parking space becomes available for new incoming cars. It's about to get hectic. Good luck!

Features,
● Incredibly fun park and return gameplay
● Keep up with the increasing amount of cars
● Easy to learn, difficult to master
● Unique parking lot setups in beautiful locations
● Upbeat and feel good music with each new level
● Multitouch support: Play alone or coop with a friend
● Different game speeds to match your skills
● Two screen modes for tablet and mobile devices
● More than 10 fun, and challenging, achievements
● Available in 12 languages
● Many hours of fun addictive gameplay

Supported languages,
English, Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, German, Polish, Dutch, Russian, Korean, Chinese and Japanese

Required permissions,
● Network access for leaderboards, achievements and in app purchases

Valet Frenzy is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.

This game has been created by just 1 person, so your feedback is most welcome!
Questions? Contact us at formidablue@gmail.com.
